sentences.en: ...a 65-year-old patient suffering from severe viral pneumonia.
sentences.cn: …一位65岁患有严重病毒性肺炎的病人。

sentences.en: A variety of viral agents cause aseptic meningitis or meningoencephalitis.
sentences.cn: 各种病毒性因子可引起无菌性脑膜炎或脑膜脑炎.

sentences.en: A viral infection may be localized disseminated or inapparent.
sentences.cn: 病毒感染可以是局限性的,扩散性的,或不显性的.

sentences.en: Acute sinusitis is usually initiated by an acute respiratory tract infection of viral etiology.
sentences.cn: 急性鼻窦炎常常是由病毒性病因的急性呼吸道感染而发生.

sentences.en: Animals may serve as a vehicle for viral transmission.
sentences.cn: 动物可能成为病毒传播的媒介.

sentences.en: Asthmatics have an increased susceptibility to viral illnesses.
sentences.cn: 气喘病人对病毒性病变的敏感性增加了.

sentences.en: At any time the macrophage system might be injured by viral infection or air pollutant exposure.
sentences.cn: 巨噬细胞随时都可能受病毒感染或空气污染物所损伤.

sentences.en: He is suffering from viral meningitis.
No human tumor has yet been conclusively shown to be viral in origin.
sentences.cn: 至今尚不能下结论说有些人类的肿瘤是由病毒所引起的.

sentences.en: Some viral diseases are more severe during pregnancy, probably tecause of hormonal changes.
sentences.cn: 有些病毒病在妊娠期间比较严重, 可能是由于激素变化引起的.

sentences.en: The rate of sedimentation of a suspended viral particle depends on its size and density.
sentences.cn: 悬浮病毒粒子的沉降率因其大小和密度而异.

sentences.en: The veterinary virologist and the clinician are naturally interested in effectively combating a viral infection.
sentences.cn: 兽医病毒学家和临床医师对有效地制止病毒的感染自然会感兴趣.

sentences.en: Two types of viral symmetry have been recognized, the cubical symmetry and helical symmetry.
sentences.cn: 已经证实病毒有两种对称型, 即立体对称和螺旋对称.

sentences.en: Viral bovine rhinotracheitis simulates and may be combined with shipping fever.
sentences.cn: 牛病毒性鼻气管炎和运输热相似,并可能和运输热同时发生.

sentences.en: Viral infections are associated with up to 50 % of asthmatic attacks in children.
sentences.cn: 受气喘病侵袭的儿童中,有高达50%的人与病毒感染有关.

phrases.tran_cn: 病毒式营销；传染式营销

trans.tran_en: relating to or caused by a virus
